projects.name: CultBot
projects.description: Multi-Purpose Chatbot for Discord. Integrates with the Discord command API to provide a karma functionality.

projects.name: Tweetbot
projects.description: Server program which listens for tweets and relays them to discord webhooks. The Database is implemented in MongoDB and the whole thing is also set up to work as a docker image.

projects.name: ParliamentDiagram Generator
projects.description: A Node.js and Vue.js rewrite of the original parliament diagram creator designed for use on Wikipedia, Wikimedia Commons and Wikidata. My motivation was to create a modern web application to allow for a faster and easier workflow, as well as incorporate modern web solution such as local storage and single-page applications which don't require a server.

projects.name: Travellers Mod
projects.description: After the MMO game Worlds Adrift in July 2019 a fan-made project to recreate elements of the game through modding Minecraft began, working under the name Travellers - the original working title of Worlds Adrift. My role on the project is working on reverse-engineering and then implementing the knowledge and schematic systems in Java

projects.name: UK Elections Hex Map
projects.description: An interactive hex-map of the UK Parliamentary Constituencies with election results for the 2015, 2017 and 2019 general elections as well as by-elections in-between. Allows for multiple viewing options and constituency search. Data was sourced from the House of Commons library, ODI Leeds for the Hex Map and the Open Geography Portal for ONS names and codes, data was pre-processed using python scripts to create JSON files.

projects.name: UK Petition Data Viewer
projects.description: Displays UK Parliament Petition data but with an extra level of breakdown and analysis. See the data by constituency, country, UK region. See also totals for MPs by party. A simple serverless web app motivated by the many popular petitions which were created at the time.

projects.name: Panthers Car
projects.description: Building a functioning 4x4 remote controlled car from scratch and programming a control system which allows 4 wheel steering, throttle control, daylight activated headlights, tilt sensor, and an active suspension for tilt correction. Code was written for the Arduino microcontroller in C++, the car and our team went on to win the 2019 National Championships. Unfortuntely the source code can not be published publicly.

projects.name: Engine Roller (Worlds Adrift)
projects.description: A speculative project which randomly generates schematics similar to those which appear in Worlds Adrift. Contributions from Ziwix (Random Algorithm) and Machine Maker (Schematic names) were invaluable in reverse-engineering the process.

projects.name: Playing Card Engine
projects.description: Object Oriented Python module which represents cards, decks and hands of cards in python. Also includes algorithms for scoring 5-card poker hands, shuffling decks, drawing cards and discarding

projects.name: 5 Card Draw (Website)
projects.description: Web version of the python Card Engine. Simple implementation of Poker (5 card draw). Click cards to discard, and click draw to draw from deck/rank hand.

projects.name: WANN Podcast (Worlds Adrift)
projects.description: A podcast/newscast project recorded weekly based about news in the Worlds Adrift game. I was involved as an Editor and Producer of the show, thanks also go to: MeisterKeen (Voice, Production), Vick Viper (Voice), Louthinator (Voice), Mattcus (Editing, Production, Music) as well as any guests which appeared on the show.

coursework.name: Robot Maze Controller
coursework.description: Create a controller for a Robot Maze
